name: Welcome To Heaven (itch) (Ciellee)
description:
Please play in full screen ;)

Movement: Left and Right arrow keys or [A] and [D].
Use inventory item: Z, X and C keys. There will be upward and downward direction indicators to show the character is going up or down

This game is submitted for Ludum Dare 42 Jam with the theme Running Out of Space.

Life is short, you can die anytime, so Welcome to Heaven. Inventory slots are limited, like your life. if you don’t do it now, you’re going to miss the other things in your life. so keep spamming your inventory slots, and hope for the best to get good items.

We are a group of 7 (check the ludum dare website to know the other members) and it's our first time joining Ludum Dare or any Game Jams. Feel free to tell us anything that need to be improve. Oh and the arts are partially from open sources and some are created by our team members so yeap~
